trajectory.content_en:
Admission Date: 2010-04-10
Gender: MALE
Age at Initial Pathologic Diagnosis: 63
Race: WHITE
Ethnicity: NOT HISPANIC OR LATINO
Submitted Tumor Site: Colon
History of Other Malignancy: NO
History of Neoadjuvant Treatment: No
Year of Initial Pathologic Diagnosis: 2010
Anatomic Organ Subdivision: Sigmoid Colon
Weight at Diagnosis (kg): 81.0
Height at Diagnosis (cm): 170.0
CEA Level Before Treatment: 2.3
History of Colon Polyps: NO
Colon Polyps at Procurement Indicator: NO
Family History of Colorectal Cancer: 0

Sure, here's a summary of the pathological report:
Department of Cancer Pathology
Examination:
- Histopathological examination of a resected segment of the large intestine.
Macroscopic Description:
- A 13.3 cm segment of the large intestine with a 15 x 10 x 2.5 cm segment of the mesenterium.
- Presence of a cauliflower-shaped tumor measuring 5.9 x 4.9 x 1.3 cm in the mucosa.
- The tumor surrounds 95% of the intestine circumference, located 3.6 cm from one incision line and 6.2 cm from the opposite one.
Microscopic Description:
- Adenocarcinoma tubulopapillare (G2) with infiltration into pericolic adipose tissue.
- Intestinal ends are free of neoplastic lesions.
- Carcinomatous metastases in lymph nodes (No 1/VIII).
Histopathological Diagnosis:
- Tubulopapillary adenocarcinoma of the colon with metastases in lymph nodes (No I / VIII).
- Classification: G2, Dukes C, Astler-Coller C2, pT3, pN1.
trajectory.content:
以下是病理报告的摘要：
癌症病理科
检查：
- 对切除的大肠段进行组织病理学检查。
宏观描述：
- 一段13.3厘米长的大肠，带有一段15 x 10 x 2.5厘米的肠系膜。
- 在黏膜上存在一个5.9 x 4.9 x 1.3厘米的菜花状肿瘤。
- 肿瘤环绕95%的肠周长，距离一个切口线3.6厘米，距离对侧切口线6.2厘米。
微观描述：
- 管状乳头状腺癌（G2），浸润到周围脂肪组织。
- 肠段两端没有肿瘤病变。
- 淋巴结（No 1/VIII）有癌转移。
病理诊断：
- 结肠管状乳头状腺癌，伴有淋巴结（No I / VIII）转移。
- 分类：G2，Dukes C，Astler-Coller C2，pT3，pN1。
